title: The Valley
lyrics:
I've spent my life trying to be
A solar light
In the darkest sea
Wearing my shield
For the final fight
I won't back down

I won't bend a knee



Yea though I walk through

The Valley of the shadow

Of Death

I fear no evil, no evil



I look back

Upon my life and know

I've gone far

But have a long way to go

I've done things

That only others dream

A miracle

Or so at least it seems



Yea though I walk through

The Valley of the shadow

Of Death

I fear no evil, no evil
